name: Neko Girls Puzzle
description:
Neko Girls Puzzle is an amazing puzzle game with beautiful neko-women.

Unlike other puzzles, you don't have to move the pieces, just rotate them! Lots of puzzles with beautiful anime images and relaxing music await you.

Spin, relax, unlock new levels!

Features:
• Cute anime images
• More than 30 puzzles
• Relaxing music
• Exciting game mechanics
• Cat girls, meow
